data.caption: Clarification sought from IFCI Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from IFCI Ltd on January 20 2026 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
